game.l_dis:
Riddle Transfer – Escape the Alien Facility

Riddle Transfer is the sixth point-and-click adventure in the Riddle School series. Players guide Phil Eggtree and his friends as they are imprisoned in an alien facility and must solve puzzles to escape and help the alien Diz.

What is Riddle Transfer?

This installment continues the story from Riddle School 5. Players explore the alien facility, interact with objects, combine items, and solve puzzles to free Phil, his friends, and the alien Diz, maintaining the series’ signature humor and puzzle-solving gameplay.

How to Play Riddle Transfer?

  • Point-and-Click: Click around the alien facility to interact with objects and characters.
  • Collect and Combine Items: Use items strategically to solve puzzles and unlock new areas.
  • Rescue Friends: Help Phil and his friends overcome obstacles to escape the facility.
  • Solve Puzzles: Explore rooms and combine clues and items creatively.
  • Advance the Story: Complete objectives to progress through the alien facility and resolve the plot.

Why Play Riddle Transfer Unblocked?

Enjoy Riddle Transfer online without restrictions, with engaging puzzles, humor, and the continuation of the beloved Riddle School adventure series.

Key Features

  • Alien Facility: Explore multiple rooms and mysterious areas in the alien prison.
  • Puzzle Adventure: Solve complex puzzles using collected and combined items.
  • Story Continuation: Continues from Riddle School 5 with new plot twists.
  • Humor and Challenge: Maintains the series’ comedic tone while presenting challenging puzzles.
  • Unblocked Online: Play anywhere directly in your browser.

Can You Escape?

Test your wits in Riddle Transfer by solving puzzles, rescuing friends, and helping Diz escape the alien facility!
